page.title: 18SHARPS COPSE RECREATION
page.content: There are 2 main venues in this area of W. Leigh where the social life takes place. These are St. Alban's Church Hall and Wakefords Community School. The Church Hall is fully used Monday - Friday by such organisations as a Playschool (4 mornings), Youth Club, Leigh Singers, Women's Club, Brownies, O.A.P. Club, Mums & Toddlers, Variety Club, and Friday Fellowship (for the elderly). Dancing classes and a Badminton Club are also held here. Wakefords Community School has a swimming pool which is fully utilised by local clubs, and their sports hall is kept busy by those playing 5 a side football, badminton, cricket, etc. A youth club is held there every evening and Havant Gym Club also meet there. Both venues are used for wedding receptions, discos and dances.
